表 Path to MAR file that will be uploaded to the VSE. The field supports multiple strings delimited by a separate line or comma.
Possibilities: 場[[BU5Q0]]

表 for files in job workspace you can specify: 場[[BU5R0]]

  • 表 relative path to MAR file in job workspace (example: dir/test.mar) 場[[BU5S0]]
  • 表 path to MAR files using ant glob syntax (example: **/*.mar) 場[[BU5T0]]

表 for files on the DevTest machine you can specify: 場[[BU5U0]]

  • 表 absolute path to file (example: file:///C:/something/test.mar) 場[[BU5V0]]
  • 表 http location of MAR file (example: http://something/test.mar) 場[[BU5W0]]
